title: Interrogating Risu about her Punches and Plants Comics Collab - COMPLETE

replies.body:
I was in this thread when it got deleted yesterday, bit of an misclick early post I'm guessing? 

Anywoo, love your art, and especially your comics. What games ya been playing if any?
I'm very impressed you were able to hop in there. It was up and down in like... 13 seconds.
They call me the fastest clicker in the Wild West.

> [{quoted}](name=Dr Mercy,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=w5vK3js0,comment-id=0007,timestamp=2017-10-31T18:02:03.256+0000)
>
> I was in this thread when it got deleted yesterday, bit of an misclick early post I'm guessing? 
> 
> Anywoo, love your art, and especially your comics. What games ya been playing if any?

Thanks! Currently I'm playing Overwatch, Pokemon Gold, and Life is Strange: Before the storm. Might be playing The Walking Dead tonight for halloween! {{sticker:zombie-brand-mindblown}}
Pricefield or Amberfield?
what's your pokemon team right now?

>playing WD

Which season?!

s1 the best

s2 okay

s3 is...debatable.

STILL, good taste! I fucking love me some Pokemon.
This was a lot of good fun to read while it was out. Hope you do more work in the future and Riot shares it some more :D
Stay tuned friend. We're already noodling on Season Two!
Hell ya!
{{sticker:poppy-wink}}

> [{quoted}](name=Kloqdq,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=w5vK3js0,comment-id=000b,timestamp=2017-10-31T19:27:06.129+0000)
>
> This was a lot of good fun to read while it was out. Hope you do more work in the future and Riot shares it some more :D

thank you!
I just wanted to thank you for drawing Vi like the strong buff woman she is supposed to be

> [{quoted}](name=Jabalor,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=w5vK3js0,comment-id=0005,timestamp=2017-10-31T17:37:36.877+0000)
>
> I just wanted to thank you for drawing Vi like the strong buff woman she is supposed to be

You're welcome! She needs to be bigger and buffer {{sticker:sg-lux}}
hey risu how are you so cool?????? and how can i be cool like you :?

> [{quoted}](name=sodaperson,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=w5vK3js0,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2017-10-31T17:33:50.410+0000)
>
> hey risu how are you so cool?????? and how can i be cool like you :?

Drink lots of coffee and eat a lot of matcha desserts.
Wub me {{sticker:sg-soraka}}
Upvoted for Soraka sticker

What gave you the idea to use AD Blitzcrank as the antagonist?
{{champion:53}} {{item:3031}} {{item:3153}} {{item:3072}}

> [{quoted}](name=RainbowBell87,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=w5vK3js0,comment-id=000a,timestamp=2017-10-31T19:13:55.831+0000)
>
> What gave you the idea to use AD Blitzcrank as the antagonist?
> {{champion:53}} {{item:3031}} {{item:3153}} {{item:3072}}

We had the idea of a double agent, the obvious answer would've been Mafia Graves, but we thought the idea of Blitz just covered in swords was hilarious, so we went with that!

Really enjoyed the comic thus far! I have to admit, your portrayal of Zyra is not something that I would have thought of naturally, but it's really clear how much thought you've put into this, and it's been great getting this other perspective on our favorite plant lady! A few questions for you:

Why did you choose Vi as her partner versus any of the other Police skin characters?
How do you feel about the other trees on the rift (looking at you, {{champion:57}} and {{champion:427}} )? And how do you think Zyra feels?
If you had to pick another champ besides Zyra to make a comic out of, who would it be?

Cheers and thanks!

{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

> [{quoted}](name=LegoLogos,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=w5vK3js0,comment-id=0008,timestamp=2017-10-31T18:10:34.606+0000)
>
> Really enjoyed the comic thus far! I have to admit, your portrayal of Zyra is not something that I would have thought of naturally, but it's really clear how much thought you've put into this, and it's been great getting this other perspective on our favorite plant lady! A few questions for you:
> 
> Why did you choose Vi as her partner versus any of the other Police skin characters?
> How do you feel about the other trees on the rift (looking at you, {{champion:57}} and {{champion:427}} )? And how do you think Zyra feels?
> If you had to pick another champ besides Zyra to make a comic out of, who would it be?
> 
> Cheers and thanks!
> 
> {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

Thank you so much, glad you're enjoying the comic!  To answer your questions:

1. Actually Vi was in the original cast. Zyra came after!
2. Maokai is just loveably grumpy and well Ivern creeps me out (his animation is too much like Tallbird from Don't Starve). I definitely think Zyra and Maokai bicker like old friends but have a very strong understanding despite their differences. Zyra would probably find Ivern fascinating but obnoxious. 
3. Oh man, well I've always loved Vi and Ziggs (probably why they're already included). Otherwise it'd probably be Miss Fortune or Katarina! Guess I love my red hair babes.
I'm expecting Elise in the next comic.

> [{quoted}](name=P0IS0N IVY,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=w5vK3js0,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2017-10-31T17:37:21.734+0000)
>
> I'm expecting Elise in the next comic.

{{champion:60}}  Will the spider be able to crawl into the WEBcomic?
That's enough puns to last me the whole year ty.

Thanks for the amazing work you've been giving us these last weeks. With Zyra being your favourite champion, have you made any fan skin concepts for her? (Other than Officer Zyro. Riot pls let's get on this.)

> [{quoted}](name=Baechu,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=w5vK3js0,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2017-10-31T17:31:04.070+0000)
>
> Thanks for the amazing work you've been giving us these last weeks. With Zyra being your favourite champion, have you made any fan skin concepts for her? (Other than Officer Zyro. Riot pls let's get on this.)


Thanks Baechu! I've made an Arcade Zyra, Academy Zyra and a onesie Zyra.{{sticker:katarina-love}}
Where are they? Don't tease us!

> [{quoted}](name=Versyxe,realm=EUW,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=w5vK3js0,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2017-10-31T17:34:16.059+0000)
>
> Just wanted to say congrats on your comic Risusu <3 Punches and Plants is definitely a lovely dive back into your Zyra blog. As always, your art is wonderful and you keep getting better and better each time
> 
> Eventhoughthereshouldhavebeenmore{{champion:51}} 
> 
> -- Your secret admirer


We'll have to see about putting some more of the chief huh? {{champion:267}} {{champion:51}}

Risu, loved your series. Keep up the good work!

-Zyra Main since 2013.

> [{quoted}](name=Kei143,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=w5vK3js0,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-10-31T17:23:09.081+0000)
>
> Risu, loved your series. Keep up the good work!
> 
> -Zyra Main since 2013.

Thank you! Yes Zyra main buddies!

Fun fact around this time I celebrate a year since the release of my first chapter for **[NOXIAN TALE](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/skin-champion-concepts/XlKibnEB-a-noxian-tale-teaser-and-explanation)**... Which recently started a part 3, which will be with lots of chapters...
Would of been awesome if someone even cared...

ah. since we're self promoting

I just released Part 4 of "**Adopted By Markiplier**" on fanfic.net, check that out.
Your name tho
Im not self promoting. I just pointing out how my 1 year work of 96k words fiction is unappreciated at max...

The comic was definitely entertaining but how did you chose the police cast!
-Kenny

> [{quoted}](name=KennyMasterLin,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=w5vK3js0,comment-id=0009,timestamp=2017-10-31T19:07:44.179+0000)
>
> The comic was definitely entertaining but how did you chose the police cast!
> -Kenny
I definitely wanted a diverse cast of characters that I felt would have a strong dynamic with each other, unfortunately that meant cutting some of the riot characters! May also be my way of hinting that I want these skins to be made hah. {{sticker:sg-ahri-2}}

I absolutely love your work, Im glad that Zyra is more represented in the League's Universe by talented artists like you.

Zyra mains, High-five !

I sincerely hope you can do more arts for the community in the future, thanks for your work !

> [{quoted}](name=Zatsukino,realm=EUW,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=w5vK3js0,comment-id=0006,timestamp=2017-10-31T17:39:41.740+0000)
>
> I absolutely love your work, Im glad that Zyra is more represented in the League's Universe by talented artists like you.
> 
> Zyra mains, High-five !
> 
> I sincerely hope you can do more arts for the community in the future, thanks for your work !

Thank you so much! (high fives) I hope I will be able to too haha! {{summoner:31}}
omg risu i'm such a huge phamgirl of yours ( ͡°⁄ ⁄ ͜⁄ ⁄ʖ⁄ ⁄ ͡°)
YOOO My girl giving reps to TohDaryl <3
So what's the best Zyra skin and why is it Dragon Sorceress?
